import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Data from '../../static/data'; import './scrumboard.css' export class ScrumBoard extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.stat } state = Data; render() { console.log('logged in as', Data.name); return (

CHATSCRUM

User type:{Data.userType}

Project Name:{Data.projectType}

Hello {Data.name}. Welcome to your scrumboard

Weekly tasks

Daily Target

Add a new task
X
) } } export default ScrumBoard
